note:
Was called a writer, wasn't insulted. Sometimes runs, sometimes fights, always dwells on it afterward.

Facing west-ish.

"The art of helping someone NOT to feel cornered."

"I'm on the other side of the abyss and I'm also staring back at you but I'm like 'don't follow the path I did, there's a bridge over there' "

fields.name: Banner Alt Text
fields.value: Painting by artist John Berkey depicting a bloom of warmth suggesting a thruster emitting from a huge impression of a spacecraft. Featured on the cover of Our Universe, a National Geographic publication about cosmology and astronomy aimed at growing minds
